website_summaries.verdict: Simple and soft, these bandeau bras are comfortable enough for everyday wear.
pros: Bandeaus run true to size, and there's no need to size down for a stay-put fit
They have removable soft pads to provide more discretion
As they're made with nylon and spandex, they flex with your body's natural movements
cons: Sizes run small through XXXL, but the differences don't always accommodate larger cup sizes

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’4 and 155 lbs and got a 3 pack of the size large. Totally comfortable and I think a medium would of fit just as good. The black and nude are the most functional with my wardrobe so the white I use for my dark colored clothing that’s not see thru like denim dresses and baggy sweats. I’m not very busty 36 A so the cups give me a great shape underneath my clothing.
customer_reviews.author: a berm

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected
customer_reviews.text: I was really hesitant about purchasing these as it’s really hard to find a decent strapless bra. These are great so far! They don’t give you a ton of shape but they work well and stay up!
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely No support!
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money. Soft and comfortable but offers no support especially for any bigger than a C cup. I don't even wear them
customer_reviews.author: Ryan A Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are so soft and great bandeaus. They do slide down while wearing but that’s to be expected. They definitely get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Slips a littlr
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, but slips a bit. As you walk, it slides down.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Shea

customer_reviews.title: Good bra!
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I was scared to get the size I thought I should get. I'm a 38/40 D and bought xxl. I could have definitely worn xl at least. The bra is great otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & Firm Hold - A+!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZED. This thing is insanely comfortable. I tried it on but refuse to take it off. And..... wait for it ladies..... my ‘placement’ is better than any strapless I’ve ever owned. EVER. I don’t get it, but it really, really does what it’s supposed to and I was skeptical that it would hold because of the material, no wire, no silicone strip, etc. They’re up where they should be, no digging into my skin anywhere, and this small section slightly gathered in the middle creates a natural separation so I don’t look like I’m toting around a pressed ham. Just amazed.... as well as purchasing it again in as many colors as I deem necessary. 170lbs / 36-38 C.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: 😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁
customer_reviews.text: WAS SO WORRIED I WOULDNT LIKE THESE.. I HAD ONE I LOVED AND IT WASNT AVAILABLE SO I TOOK A CHANCE.. SO GLAD.. THESE ARE SOFT N STRETCHY YET THEY STAY UP ALL DAY FOR ME.. I USUALLY WASH THEN AIR DRY..ONE SLIPPED INTO DRYER BUT IT WAS FINE.. SLIGHTLY SHORTER BUT FINE.. NOW THE LIL PAD MOVES AROUND IN WASH BUT ITS EASY TO PUSH BACK IN PLACE.. I KINDA WISH IT WAS A LARGER CIRCLE BUT ITS REALLY JUST FOR A LESS FLATTENED LOOK AND NIPPLE COVER.. THEY WOULD NOT LOOK GREAT UNDER A TIGHT SHIRT BUT FINE UNDER ANYTHING ELSE.. SO COMFY..ESPECIALLY WHEN ITS HOT N HUMID..I MAY NEVER WEAR A REG BRA AGAIN! 🐈🐈🐈🐈🐈🐈
customer_reviews.author: 🐆😺MeoW😸🐆

customer_reviews.title: It’s $10
customer_reviews.text: It serves its purpose for the price paid. There isn’t anything fancy to it, it’s exactly as advertised. I did not find the padding overwhelming at all, like some of the other reviewers did. It’s just a tiny bit snug, not enough to hurt or feel uncomfortable. I’m a size “smedium” meaning I hover between a small and medium depending on what brand (5’2” 125 lbs) and probably would have fit a medium fine but I’m ok with the small.
customer_reviews.author: Noneya Bisniss

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but weird pads
customer_reviews.text: I am a 36C and after reading some say it fit larger than expected, I ordered a medium rather than a large. The material is great and fit comfortably and snug. However, the pads for the bra are very weird. They are small, hard, and poke out, making it look unflattering for my chest. The actual pads for the bra do not look like they do in the picture. They are removable, which I'm guessing is the reason for the weirdness. I also don't want to wear it without padding because I need the support.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley M

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable pads
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. The removable pads make it so that you can adjust these for any shape breast, which I appreciate. Of course, because of the elastic, it really creates serious lumps around the armpit. Also, these are high coverage so you can't wear anything remotely low cut in the front or the back. I bought this to wear with tank tops, so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Gillmore

customer_reviews.title: Ok.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love it. It has the removable pads which are great. The stretch was great. I did not like how it minimizes you and it makes your fat under your arm more prominent. I am 127lbs and 5'5" 36B and I ordered small and medium. Medium fit best. I am returning though as this style did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: momof3boys

customer_reviews.title: Weird shaped pad but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this style of bra. I took the pads out of this bra because they were very firm and did not cover the whole breast - example: when I would wear them with a tight shirt, it looked like I had huge nlpples due to the size of the cup. I took the cups out and use them anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Knots & Charm

customer_reviews.title: Not very flattering
customer_reviews.text: This bra is comfortable but the padding gave me a strange unflattering shape.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Bermingham

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly supportive and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have really big boobs so obviously I don’t expect this strapless bra to be super supportive but I was pleasantly surprised. Very comfy and stays in place!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Strapless Bra
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has removable pads.It is very comfortable and lightweight.This was good purchase.:) :)
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is secure, comfortable and fits my body like a second skin. I love to wear dresses and shirts that have are strapless. Shopping for the right bra can be so stressful. Especially when the bra starts to slide down. This bra has great support and no more worries about my bra falling down. Not only that, with the support it has - you do not have to worry about your boo-boos looking like they are "drooping" or looking like "a uni boob" which happens a lot when wearing sports bras. Princess Thoughts: I have worn this to bed for support and comfort. This is a Great Bra!
customer_reviews.author: Princess Ang is on Fire

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: Based off of the size chart I got a large because I'm a 34D. I wore for a night and found myself needing to pull it up. Overall it's comfortable, I would give it 5 stars except for the fact that the size chart is wrong. I'm returning for a size medium. Other than that, fits well and is seamless under strapless tops and off the shoulder tops.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Dixon

product_meta.title: Time and River Women's Padded Bandeau Bra, Strapless Basic Layer Tube Top 1-4 Packs
feature_bullets: These Bandeau Bra are made of 96% nylon 4% spandex, no underwire, no straps, comfy and healthy for everyday wear at home.
UNDER BUST SIZE INFORMATION (inches) - S: 27.5-31.5, M: 31.5-34, L: 34-36, XL: 35.5-37.5, 2XL: 37.5-41.5, 3XL: 40-43.5. Please refer to the size chart to make sure you choose the FIT SIZE.

REMOVABLE SOFT PAD - The basic bandeau bra has removable soft pads to provide support and protect your breasts during walking, jogging, hiking, gym workouts, yoga, playing volleyball, cycling, or dancing, so there will be no need to worry about any embarrassing situation. It is also rather comfortable to wear during sleep or lounging around the house. Easy to wash and dry to keep you healthy.

QUALITY MATERIAL - Made of premium nylon, the elastic seamless bandeau top feels ultra smooth without causing any irritation reaction. Soft and stretchy fabric with elastic upper and lower edges keeps the bandeau bra in place and prevents it from slipping off. Breathable material wicks sweat away to keep your body cool even in hot day.

STRAPLESS DESIGN - The bandeau bra is extremely suitable to match with beautiful strapless dress and top for any occasion. A high quality bandeau is a perfect accessory for all women to show your beauty and confidence.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - If encounter any problems about the shopping, please contact us in time. We are confident in all the products we sell and have always been devoted to offering quality service. For any commodity quality issue, just e-mail us with picture proof and we will do our best to solve it asap!
